ALLPlayersCards.name: Polymorph
ALLPlayersCards.description: Transform minion in to a 1/1 sheep.

ALLPlayersCards.name: RollingFireball
ALLPlayersCards.description: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.1 sheep.

ALLPlayersCards.name: MalygossExplosion
ALLPlayersCards.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

ALLPlayersCards.name: Backstab
ALLPlayersCards.description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.

ALLPlayersCards.name: GoblinBomb
ALLPlayersCards.description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

ALLPlayersCards.name: MalygossFrostbolt
ALLPlayersCards.description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
